name: BathingCat
summary:
*****
When the widget's appearance was strange after the update, Please put your widget on Home screen again.
*****
This is a battery widget.
The cat informs you of bath levels(battery status)
[Bath Levels]
Water Level = battery Remain
Temp. = battery Temp.
*Water Level(Default Settings)
30%-:the cat cries
20%-:the cat is angry
10%-:imagine the cat yourself
*Temp.
40℃-:the cat sweats
Please notice the attitude of the cat, and manage your battery.
Translation by Douglas Dear
info:
• 中文名: 沐浴中的小猫
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: widget
  • 开发者: sugitom
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=jp.sugitom.android.furoneko
